Daḍḍhi°，[not with Trenckner，Notes p．65=Sk．dārḍhya，but with Kern，Toev．113=Sk．dṛḍhī （from dṛḍha，see daḷha），as in compn dṛḍhī karoti & bhavati to make or become strong] making firm，strengthening，in kayādaḍḍhi-bahula strengthened by gymnastics，an athlete J.III，310 （v．l．daḷhi°），IV.219 （v．l．distorted kādaḷiphahuna）．（Page 312）
